trans-unit.source: Wraps server controls that are not <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls so that they can appear and behave as true <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls at run time.
trans-unit.target: 服务器控件且不进行包装<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制，以便他们可以显示和行为为 true，则<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件在运行时。

trans-unit.source: The GenericWebPart control exists to provide a run-time wrapper for server controls that are not <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, so that such controls can be used in Web Parts pages and applications.
trans-unit.target: GenericWebPart 控件存在为服务器控件不提供的运行时包装<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制，以便可以在 Web 部件页及应用程序中使用此类控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: When developers add server controls--such as user controls, ASP.NET server controls, or existing custom controls--to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control, the GenericWebPart control automatically wraps the server controls at run time so they can exhibit the same functionality as true <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 当开发人员添加服务器控件-如用户控件、 ASP.NET 服务器控件或现有的自定义控件-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>控件，GenericWebPart 控件自动换行的服务器控件在运行时它们会表现出为 true，则相同的功能以便<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The following table compares and contrasts GenericWebPart controls and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下表比较和对比 GenericWebPart 控件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: |GenericWebPart control|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control| |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |Exists to equip server controls that are not <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls with Web Parts functionality, so that any ASP.NET, custom, or user control can participate in Web Parts applications.|Exists to create custom ASP.NET controls that have native Web Parts functionality built in.
trans-unit.target: |GenericWebPart 控件 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件 | |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |存在，无法为这样的任何不<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件与 Web 部件功能的服务器控件 ASP.NET，在 Web 部件应用程序可以参与自定义或用户控件。 |存在，无法创建具有本机 Web 部件内置功能单元的自定义 ASP.NET 控件</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: This includes personalization, connections, import and export, and drag-and-drop capabilities.| |Is never declared in the markup of a page.
trans-unit.target: 这包括个性化、 连接、 导入和导出和拖放功能。 | |永远不会在页面的标记中声明。

trans-unit.source: It exists only to wrap server controls at run time, and to give the wrapped control (or child control) the full functionality of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.|Can be declared in the markup of a page at design time, like an ASP.NET server control, except that it is declared in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone.| |Includes and integrates its child control into the Web Parts personalization process so that it can act as a true <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 它存在仅在运行时，包装服务器控件并为包装的控件 （或子控件） 提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件的完整功能。 |可以声明中的页面的标记在设计时，如 ASP.NET 服务器控件，只不过在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>区域中声明。 | |包括并将其子控件集成到 Web 部件个性化处理，以便它可以充当真正<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: This occurs automatically, which makes it simple for developers to use server controls and user controls in Web Parts applications.|Is automatically included in the Web Parts personalization process.| |Can be accessed programmatically at run time (by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetGenericWebPart%2A> method and passing to it the child server control), like a true <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control or a standard ASP.NET control.|Can be accessed programmatically at run time, like a standard ASP.NET control.| Users benefit from the GenericWebPart control because it provides a consistent user experience.
trans-unit.target: 这会自动发生，这可使开发人员能够使用 Web 部件应用程序中的服务器控件和用户控件更加简单。 |Web 部件个性化过程中自动包括。 | |可以以编程方式在运行时 （通过使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetGenericWebPart%2A>方法并传递到它子服务器控件），如 true<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件或标准的 ASP.NET 控制。 |可以在运行时，与标准的 ASP.NET 控件一样以编程方式访问。 | 用户得益于 GenericWebPart 控件中，因为它提供一致的用户体验。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetGenericWebPart%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any server control can be made to function like a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and will have the same consistent user interface (UI) elements such as verbs, icons, a title, and a header.
trans-unit.target: 所有服务器控件可以都进行功能上相当于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，然后将具有的相同的一致的用户界面 (UI) 元素，例如谓词、 图标、 标题和标头。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Developers benefit from the GenericWebPart control because it enables them to reuse existing user controls and server controls within Web Parts applications.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员受益 GenericWebPart 控件，因为它使它们能够重复使用现有的用户控件和 Web 部件应用程序中的服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you create Web Parts pages, you do not have to do anything to enable an existing user control or custom control to be wrapped with the GenericWebPart control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 当创建 Web 部件页时，则不需要执行任何操作即可启用现有的用户控件或自定义控件 GenericWebPart 控件进行包装。

trans-unit.source: Simply add your server or user control to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone, either programmatically or by declaring it in the page's markup, and the Web Parts control set automatically wraps your control with a GenericWebPart object at run time.
trans-unit.target: 只需将添加到服务器或用户控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>区域，以编程方式或通过声明中页面的标记，并自动设置的 Web 部件控件将您的控件与 GenericWebPart 对象包装在运行时。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: Because server controls that are placed in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones are wrapped with a GenericWebPart control at run time, developers can use ordinary server and user controls exactly as if they were <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 因为服务器控件，都将置于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>区域与 GenericWebPart 控件包装在运行时，开发人员可以使用普通的服务器和用户控件完全就像它们是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: Note that, if you declare custom controls that inherit from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>, these controls cannot support the use of the intrinsic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> properties.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果你声明自定义控件，继承自基类<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>类内<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>，这些控件无法支持的内部函数使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: Thus, you cannot declare the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> properties on such controls, including properties such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您無法宣告<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>属性对此类控件，其中包括属性，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title%2A>属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Description%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Description%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>

trans-unit.source: In contrast, other types of server controls (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, user controls, and custom controls that inherit from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>) can declare these properties, because they support the use of expando properties.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，其他类型的服务器控件 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件、 用户控件和继承的自定义控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>) 可以声明这些属性，因为它们支持 expando 属性的使用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Expando properties are actually strings that can be added to a class dynamically as a property, by means of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor> interface.
trans-unit.target: Expando 属性是实际的字符串，可以添加到类动态作为属性，通过<xref:System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor>

trans-unit.source: Controls that implement this interface, including the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class and its children, can use expando properties.
trans-unit.target: 这些控件可实现此接口，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>类及其子级，可以使用 expando 属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: Because the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class does not support expando properties, when a custom control that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class is placed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> and wrapped with a GenericWebPart control at run time, the Web Parts control set cannot dynamically add the intrinsic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> properties to the custom control.
trans-unit.target: 因为基<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>类不支持 expando 属性，继承自的自定义控件时<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>类放置在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>GenericWebPart 控件使用包装在运行时，Web 部件控件集不能动态添加内部函数和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>到自定义控件的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: You have two choices in this case.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下有两种选择。

trans-unit.source: You can use the custom control without the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> properties, or you can implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface in the custom control, enabling it to use the properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用自定义控件，而无需<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>属性，也可以实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>在自定义控件中，使其可以使用属性的接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>

trans-unit.source: As an example of how controls that inherit from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> properties, if you declare an ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control in the markup of a page (within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone) at design time, even though this control does not inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class and does not natively contain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> members, you can still treat it exactly like a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 作为举例说明如何控件继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>属性，如果你声明一个 ASP.NET<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>页面的标记中的控件 (在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>区域) 在设计时，即使此控件不是继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类，并且不以本机方式包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>成员，你可以仍将其完全相同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: You can declare <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> properties on the calendar control, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Description%2A>, and others.
trans-unit.target: 你可以声明<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>在日历上的属性控制，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Description%2A>，和其他人。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Description%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: At run time, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetGenericWebPart%2A> method, which returns the GenericWebPart control that is dynamically wrapping the calendar control, and work with it programmatically exactly as you would with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, with access to all the same properties, events, and methods.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetGenericWebPart%2A>方法，返回的 GenericWebPart 控件，可动态包装日历控件中，并使用它以编程方式就像与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制，有权访问所有相同属性、 事件和方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetGenericWebPart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The GenericWebPart control has a critical property that allows you to access its underlying server control: the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ChildControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: GenericWebPart 控件具有使您可以访问其基础的服务器控件的关键属性︰<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ChildControl%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ChildControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property allows developers to programmatically access the server control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性允许开发人员能够以编程方式访问服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ChildControl%2A> property is also used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control to access personalization data from the child control, and to perform authorization, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ChildControl%2A>还使用属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件以从子控件，访问个性化数据以及执行授权，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>属性设置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ChildControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The GenericWebPart control has several other properties, all of which override properties inherited from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class.
trans-unit.target: GenericWebPart 控件具有多个其他属性，所有这些重写属性继承自基的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: As noted, you can use these properties with any child control, so that it can behave as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 如前所述，你可以使用这些属性与任何子控件，以便它可以充当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: One important property is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> property; it determines whether all the exportable properties, or only those marked as non-sensitive, can be exported.
trans-unit.target: 一个重要的属性是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>属性; 它将确定是否可导出的所有属性，或只有标记为非敏感，可以导出。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The UI-oriented properties inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Description%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Title%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.TitleUrl%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Width%2A>, can be set in the declarative markup for any server control that is placed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: 面向用户界面的属性继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Description%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Height%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Title%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.TitleUrl%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Width%2A>，可以放置在任何服务器控件的声明性标记中设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>区域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.TitleUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Title%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Description%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Important methods in the GenericWebPart class include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.CreateControlCollection%2A> method, which creates the collection of controls (including child controls) associated with a GenericWebPart control, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Render%2A> method, which delegates all rendering to the wrapped child controls.
trans-unit.target: GenericWebPart 类中的重要方法包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.CreateControlCollection%2A>方法，这将创建的控件 （包括子控件） 与 GenericWebPart 控件关联的集合，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Render%2A>方法，该委托已包装的子控件的所有呈现方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Render%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.CreateControlCollection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The constructors on the GenericWebPart class are protected and are intended either for internal use or for extensibility scenarios.
trans-unit.target: GenericWebPart 类的构造函数进行保护，并旨在供内部使用或用于扩展性方案。

trans-unit.source: There are some additional helpful insights for working with GenericWebPart controls.
trans-unit.target: 没有使用 GenericWebPart 控件的一些其他有用见解。

trans-unit.source: If you want to set default values for the overridden properties in the GenericWebPart class, your user control or custom server control can implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interfaces, and override their members.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要设置 GenericWebPart 类中重写属性的默认值，可以实现你的用户控件或自定义服务器控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable>接口，并重写其成员。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>

trans-unit.source: At run time, the GenericWebPart control will get its values for the implemented properties from the child control that implements the interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，GenericWebPart 控件将从实现接口的子控件获取其实现属性的值。

trans-unit.source: If your control defines any of its properties as personalizable (by using the `Personalizable` metadata attribute), the GenericWebPart control automatically enables those properties for personalization at run time, just like the personalizable properties on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的控件定义的任何属性作为可个性化 (通过使用`Personalizable`元数据属性)，GenericWebPart 控件将自动启用在运行时，可个性化属性一样的个性化设置这些属性上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If you want to provide Web Parts editing features for your control, you can implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要为您的控件提供 Web 部件的编辑功能，你可以实施<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable>

trans-unit.source: At run time, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A> method is called, the GenericWebPart control's code for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.WebBrowsableObject%2A> property will call into the same property in the child control, and use the child control's implementation to create associated custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A>调用方法时，GenericWebPart 控件的代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.WebBrowsableObject%2A>属性将调入相同的属性在子控件中，并使用子控件的实现来创建关联的自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.WebBrowsableObject%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control by passing in a reference to a control that becomes the child control.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>通过传入到将成为子控件的控件的引用的控件。

trans-unit.source: The GenericWebPart constructor is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control in its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateWebPart%2A> method, to initialize an instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control by passing in a reference to a child server control.
trans-unit.target: 将调用 GenericWebPart 构造函数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制在其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateWebPart%2A>方法，以初始化的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件通过传入对子服务器控件的引用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object is created, you can reference the child control using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ChildControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>创建对象，你可以引用子控件使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ChildControl%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ChildControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: A server control that becomes the child control of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control instance.
trans-unit.target: 一个将成为的子控件的服务器控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>控件实例。

trans-unit.source: control is .
trans-unit.target: controlis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image that represents a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control in a catalog of controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示图像的 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"> </xref>在目录中的控件的控件。

trans-unit.source: Web Parts applications often provide a catalog (or list) of controls that users can add to a page.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件应用程序通常提供的用户可以添加到页面的控件的一个目录 （或列表）。

trans-unit.source: The CatalogIconImageUrl property on a control contains the URL to an image that represents the control when it appears in a catalog.
trans-unit.target: 在控件上的 CatalogIconImageUrl 属性包含在它出现在目录中时表示控件的图像 URL。

trans-unit.source: This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性重写基属性，以便你可以访问的子控件上的属性，就像它是真正的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过编程方式来以及对 Web 网页、 的声明性标记控件设置属性的值。

trans-unit.source: To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供默认值的属性，每次使用控件时，可以实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the URL to an image used to represent the control in a catalog.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于表示目录中的控件的图像的 URL 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the child control that is wrapped by a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control at run time.
trans-unit.target: 获取由包装的子控件的引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>控件在运行时。

trans-unit.source: The ChildControl property provides the means to access the child control wrapped by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: ChildControl 属性提供了一种能够访问子控件由包装<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses the ChildControl property to extract personalization data from the child control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件使用 ChildControl 属性以从子控件提取个性化数据。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> that refers to the wrapped child control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref> ，是指已包装的子控件。

trans-unit.source: Called by the ASP.NET page framework to notify server controls that use composition-based implementation to create any child controls they contain in preparation for posting back or rendering.
trans-unit.target: 由 ASP.NET 页框架调用以通知服务器控件使用基于撰写的实现在回发或呈现的准备过程中创建它们所包含任何子控件。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base method to create a read-only collection that consists of the child control wrapped by a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 重写基方法，以创建只读集合，其中包含子控件由包装<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlCollection method creates a private, read-only collection that consists of a single control, which is the child control of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: CreateControlCollection 方法创建的私有只读集合，其中包含的子控件的单个控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: This collection is created so that developers cannot manually add other controls to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 此集合在创建，以便开发人员不能手动添加到其他控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: If you want to create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control without adding the child control to the private collection, you can derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> class, override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.%23ctor%2A> constructor, and provide a different method for storing the child control referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ChildControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要创建自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件而不向专用集合添加的子控件，您可以从其中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>类，请替代<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，并提供其他方法来存储所引用的子控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ChildControl%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ChildControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> that contains the child control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref>包含子控件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls that can be used to edit the child control of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control when it is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 返回的自定义集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref>可以用于编辑的子控件的控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>控制当它处于编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: The CreateEditorParts method is called when a control enters edit display mode.
trans-unit.target: 当控件进入编辑显示模式调用 CreateEditorParts 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the base method inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class because, in the case of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control, it is the child control that is being edited, not the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control itself.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重写继承自基方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类，因为的情况下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件，它是正在编辑，未子控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件本身。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The CreateEditorParts method casts the child control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable> interface, which enables the control to be edited.
trans-unit.target: CreateEditorParts 方法强制转换到的子控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable>接口，使控件能够对其进行编辑。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable>

trans-unit.source: This overridden method is what enables server controls that do not derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class--including ASP.NET server controls, and custom server controls--to be edited as normal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 此重写的方法是一种使不派生自的服务器控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类-包括 ASP.NET 服务器控件和自定义服务器控件-要编辑作为普通<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"></xref> that contains custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls associated with a server control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含自定义<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref>与服务器控件关联的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a brief phrase that summarizes what a control does, for use in ToolTips and catalogs of server controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个短语，总结了该控件的作用，用于工具提示和的服务器控件目录。

trans-unit.source: The Description property value is typically used as a descriptive string for a control in catalogs that provide lists of server controls, and as a ToolTip in a control's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 提供的服务器控件的列表的目录中的控件的描述性字符串以及为工具提示控件的标题栏中，通常使用说明属性值。

trans-unit.source: The content of the property appears in a ToolTip when a user positions the mouse pointer over the title text in a control's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将鼠标指针定位控件的标题栏中的标题文本上时，对属性的内容将显示在工具提示。

trans-unit.source: This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性重写基属性，以便你可以访问的子控件上的属性，就像它是真正的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过编程方式来以及对 Web 网页、 的声明性标记控件设置属性的值。

trans-unit.source: To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供默认值的属性，每次使用控件时，可以实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>

trans-unit.source: A string that briefly summarizes the control's functionality.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，简要总结了控件的功能。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height (in pixels) of a control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的高度 （以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: This property overrides the base property so that you can get or set the height on the child control as if it were a true <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性重写基属性，以便你可以获取或设置子控件上的高度，就像它是真正的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> that indicates the height of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref> ，该值指示控件的高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of a control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的 ID。

trans-unit.source: This value is not inheritable.
trans-unit.target: 此值不是可继承的。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the control.
trans-unit.target: 包含控件的 ID 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Delegates rendering the contents of the control to the child control.
trans-unit.target: 呈现该控件的子控件的内容的委托。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，它表示要在客户端呈现 HTML 内容的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that is concatenated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Title*> property value to form a complete title for a control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个字符串，串联在一起<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Title*>以形成一个完整的标题控件的属性值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Title*>

trans-unit.source: Use the Subtitle property optionally to return a standard subtitle string that will be appended to your custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control's title.
trans-unit.target: （可选） 使用副标题属性来返回将追加到您的自定义的标准副标题字符串<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件的标题。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性重写基属性，以便你可以访问的子控件上的属性，就像它是真正的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If you implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Subtitle%2A> property in a user control or custom control to provide a default value, the Web Parts control set automatically appends it to the value of the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Title%2A> property at run time to create a complete title.
trans-unit.target: 如果你实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Subtitle%2A>用户控件或自定义控件，若要提供默认值中的属性，将自动设置的 Web 部件控件将其附加到控件的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Title%2A>属性在运行时创建一个完整的标题。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Title%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Subtitle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that serves as a subtitle for the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，充当控件副标题。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the title of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标题<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The visible title text in a part control's title bar is set by the Title property.
trans-unit.target: 在一个部分的控件的标题栏中的可见标题文本由 Title 属性设置。

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply a title for a control, the Web Parts control set automatically calculates a default string to use as a title.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供控件的标题的 Web 部件控件集自动计算要用作标题的默认字符串。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, it is possible to provide a default subtitle that is appended to the title string.
trans-unit.target: 另外，还有可能提供追加到的标题字符串默认副标题。

trans-unit.source: For details, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Subtitle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Subtitle%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Subtitle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性重写基属性，以便你可以访问的子控件上的属性，就像它是真正的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过编程方式来以及对 Web 网页、 的声明性标记控件设置属性的值。

trans-unit.source: To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供默认值的属性，每次使用控件时，可以实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the title of the part control.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示部件控件的标题。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image used to represent a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control in the control's own title bar.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于表示的图像 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"> </xref>控件的标题栏中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The TitleIconImageUrl property provides a way to associate an icon with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: TitleIconImageUrl 属性使您能够将与图标关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: The icon appears in the control's own title bar.
trans-unit.target: 该图标将显示在控件的标题栏中。

trans-unit.source: For thematic consistency, application developers often make this icon similar to the image that represents the control in a catalog of Web Parts controls (the image referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: 为了确保主题一致性，应用程序开发人员通常使此图标类似于表示 Web 部件控件的目录中的控件的图像 (中引用的映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>属性)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: As it is implemented in the Web Parts control set, the TitleIconImageUrl property can be personalized by end users to change the image or icon that appears in a control's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 因为 Web 部件控件中实现的设置，TitleIconImageUrl 属性可由最终用户更改控件的标题栏中显示的图标的图像进行个性化设置。

trans-unit.source: This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性重写基属性，以便你可以访问的子控件上的属性，就像它是真正的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过编程方式来以及对 Web 网页、 的声明性标记控件设置属性的值。

trans-unit.source: To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供默认值的属性，每次使用控件时，可以实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the URL to an image.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示图像的 URL 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a URL to supplemental information about a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置有关的补充信息的 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"> </xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: When you assign a URL to the TitleUrl property, the title of the control becomes a link.
trans-unit.target: 当为 TitleUrl 属性指定 URL 时，该控件的标题将成为链接。

trans-unit.source: This property provides a convenient way for end users to access additional information about a control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性提供便利的方法，让最终用户可以访问控件的相关的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: The additional information could include copyright data, contact data, details about the creator of the control, or a summary of the purpose of a control.
trans-unit.target: 其他信息可以包括版权数据、 联系人数据有关的控件，创建者或控件的用途的摘要详细信息。

trans-unit.source: This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性重写基属性，以便你可以访问的子控件上的属性，就像它是真正的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过编程方式来以及对 Web 网页、 的声明性标记控件设置属性的值。

trans-unit.source: To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供默认值的属性，每次使用控件时，可以实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a URL to more information about a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息表示 URL 的字符串<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of custom verbs associated with a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取与关联的自定义谓词的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Verbs derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> class, and provide user interface (UI) actions that users can perform on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 谓词派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>类，并提供用户界面 (UI) 操作，用户可对执行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>

trans-unit.source: Usually, verbs are represented in the UI as buttons, links, or menu items.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，在作为按钮、 链接或菜单项的用户界面中表示谓词。

trans-unit.source: There are standard verbs for opening, closing, editing, and minimizing a control, and other verbs for exporting a definition for the control or loading a Help file.
trans-unit.target: 有标准谓词用于打开、 关闭、 编辑和最小化控件与用于导出的定义控件或加载的帮助文件的其他谓词。

trans-unit.source: These verbs are not included in the Verbs collection, because the collection contains only custom verbs.
trans-unit.target: 谓词集合中不包括这些谓词，因为该集合包含仅自定义的谓词。

trans-unit.source: This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性重写基属性，以便你可以访问的子控件上的属性，就像它是真正的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If you child control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface and thus overrides its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control uses the child control's implementation when the Verbs property is invoked on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果子控件实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable>接口，因此重写其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件使用的子控件的实现调用的 Verbs 属性时，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable>

trans-unit.source: When you create custom verbs and add them to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> collection, you can then access the verbs programmatically from a Verbs control.
trans-unit.target: 如果创建自定义谓词并将其添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A>集合，然后就可以访问谓词以编程方式从另一谓词控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection"></xref> that contains custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> objects associated with a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含自定义<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref>与关联的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection.Empty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection.Empty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the child control, to enable the control to be edited by custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取对要允许控件的自定义编辑的子控件的引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: If a child control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable> interface, and overrides its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.WebBrowsableObject%2A> property, when a user selects the control for editing, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control will call into the child control through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.WebBrowsableObject%2A> property, and use the child control's implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果子控件实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable>接口，并重写其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.WebBrowsableObject%2A>属性，当用户选择的控件的编辑，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件将调入子控制通过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.WebBrowsableObject%2A>属性，并使用子控件实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.WebBrowsableObject%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.WebBrowsableObject%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable>

trans-unit.source: This mechanism allows a server or user control that is not a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control to work with custom associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls in a Web Parts application.
trans-unit.target: 此机制允许不是服务器或用户控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制使用关联的自定义工作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>Web 部件应用程序中的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that consists of the child control of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>包含的子控件， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"> </xref>控件。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width (in pixels) of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的宽度 （以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: This property overrides the base property so that you can get or set the width on the child control as if it were a true <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性重写基属性，以便你可以获取或设置子控件上的宽度，就像它是真正的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> that indicates the width of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref> ，该值指示控件的宽度。
